title: Stuck erigon v2.30.0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
`v2.30.0`

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
`Linux erigon-1 5.10.0-16-cloud-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 5.10.127-2 (2022-07-23) x86_64 GNU/Linux`

Commit hash : 
`erigon/v2.30.0-stable-35f493c5/linux-amd64/go1.19.3`

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon can handle bad block scenario

#### Actual behaviour
